Well,I'm in the band named c'est la vie,and I'm the lead guitar player. Three months ago I went to fashion front to buy DVDs.And I decided to buy two whose cover prints the electric guitars.So I bought the School of Rock and Freakey Friday.These two movies talks a lot about the rock band,which I am intersted in. A 10-year boy call Zack in the School of Rock play this design of guitar--flying V Shut up! It makes me crazy!To own it is my dream.But Ican'tfound it anywhere in GZ,like Tom Lee and Venson. Maybe I will buy it in HongKong after my doing well in the NMET.

By the way ,I prefer American English to British English.
